name: Convolutional deep neural network on GPUs
body:
### Convolutional deep neural network on GPUs. A new way to parallelize the training of convolutional neural networks across multiple GPUs. The method scales significantly better than all alternatives when applied to modern convolutional neural networks. ### Presentation-1 This is first presentation to give you the overview of the Alex Net Architecture. The images in the slides belong to their respective owners, this was used just for educational purpose. You can view the slide [here](https://github.com/sidd4698/deep-learning/blob/master/Convolutional%20Deep%20Neural%20Networks%20on%20a%20GPU.pdf) ### Authors and Contributors Suhas Pillai (@suhaspillai)
Siddesh Pillai (@sidd4698)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
